oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Solar thermal power generation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SUKHATME, SP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: solar thermal energy
paraboloidal dish
parabolic collector technology
central receiver concept
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The technologies and systems developed thus far for solar-thermal power generation and their approximate costs are described along with discussions for future prospects.
